title: From conflict to collaboration through inclusive landscape governance: Evidence from a contested landscape in Ghana
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 88

Author(s): James Reed, Mirjam A.F. Ros-Tonen, Samuel Adeyanju, Abdul Wahid Arimiyaw, Kwabena Asubonteng, Bernard N. Baatuwie, Eric R.C. Bayala, Damian Tom-Dery, Amy Ickowitz, Yakubu B. Issaka, Kaala B. Moombe, Joseph Mumuni, George Wakesho, Mathurin Zida, Terry Sunderland
